text:
DevOps Engineeer @ TheFrameworks (theframeworks.com): we are looking for someone to join our young and growing team in a permanent position in our London offices (no remote, work permit needed).

We're looking for:

* someone with a very good Linux knowledge, OSS enthusiast

* proficient programmer in PHP (although we are looking into other possibilities - as rb or py)

Will be:

* responsible for back end development

* maintain and improve the server system

More info and application form here: http://careers.stackoverflow.com/jobs/16483/devops-engineer-...
